message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Thanks for the offer Alice! That's a bit out of my price range though. I'm willing to pay $125 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $125 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $175. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
I appreciate you coming down to $175, but that's still a little too high for me. I'm willing to pay $150 for it, which is what I can get it for elsewhere. Let me know if that works for you.
